Image:Ampa.gifAmpa is also the name in Quenya of the fourteenth letter of the Tengwar alphabet.   It is the second letter of the fourth grade or Tyellë
The names of the letters: and it is the fourth letter of the series of labial consonants
column4: the Parmatéma.  In standard Quenya spelling Ampa represents MP but in all other modes it represents V.  The Westron name for this letter is Ivi.See Westron Tengwar
